plot: Ben and Gwen get trapped in a Sumo Slammers video game and must work with the game's main character in order to return to the real world.

It's a rainy day. Gwen joins Ben in a computer game of Sumo Samurai Slamdown. As she starts beating him, Ben changes to Upgrade and regains his advantage, then lightning strikes the Rustbucket. Ben and Gwen end up inside the video game. The Omnitrix times out, and most of his Heroes no longer appear in the Omnitrix. Ben and Gwen must fight their way out of the video game.—Jesse Sanchez

It's a rainy day. Grandpa Max wants to sleep and Gwen wants her boredom alleviated, even if that means joining Ben's computer game, Sumo Samurai Smackdown, as a second player. As she proves herself a better player, Ben uses Upgrade to unfairly force the game to his favor, but a power surge from a lightning bolt yanks the kids into the game world. With the Omnitrix aliens converted into prizes to be won, Ben and Gwen must help Sumo Samurai Ishyama defeat the evil shape-shifting Kenko in order to survive, retrieve Upgrade, and get back out.—statmanjeff
